phrs.translation: 不动感情地, 冷静地, 平心静气, 沈着公平地

sentences.sentence: He sets out the facts coolly and dispassionately.
sentences.translation: 他冷静、淡定地将真相合盘端出。

sentences.sentence: When an arguer argues dispassionately he thinks only of the argument.
sentences.translation: 当一个辩论者不动感情于争辩，他只是为争辩而辩。

sentences.sentence: I hope to equip you with the tools to do this effectively and dispassionately.
sentences.translation: 我希望用工具约束你有效地，冷静的去做。
